name: Biomedical Text Annotation
description:
This is part of a fourth year university research project; the form is bellow if you would like to take part.

Initially you will be randomly assigned System A or System B. The system can be changed in the settings menu. Please use both systems for at least 5 minutes each before filling out the rest of the survey.

System A - Biomedical Annotation with gamified elements

System B - Biomedical Annotation without gamified elements

After logging in please make note of the username you used on the survey

The data could be used in medical diagnosis and/or cancer research so please make reasonable attempts at annotating.

If you haven't already started it please complete the form at: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc-4tK8fsRQRYlp-n2n-ariG3Ljhg2d2GpU3s3S...
